sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
The action "Segregate Material Data" is designed to assist SAP subflows. Its purpose is to take a JSON input and separate it into an array of objects that can be added to an import set table.

Inputs :

  • Material Object : This input takes JSON data.

Outputs :

  • Material - This output provides the segregated response in table format.
    • MARC
      • Material No
      • Plant
      • Client
      • Plant-Specific Material Status
      • Purchasing Group
      • Unit of issue
      • Material: MRP profile
      • MRP Type
      • MRP Controller
      • Procurement Type
      • Base quantity
      • Profit Center
      • Stock in Transit
      • Production unit
      • Issue Storage Location
      • MRP Group
      • Serial Number Profile
      • Unit of Measure Group (Oil, Natural Gas,..)
      • Conversion Group (Oil, Natural Gas,..)
      • Material freight group
      • Date from which the plant-specific material status is valid
      • Assignment UoM
      • Stock transfer sales value (plant to plant) for VO material
      • Stock in transfer (plant to plant)
      • Data Division MARC
      • Default storage location for external procurement
    • MARA
      • Material No.
      • Created On
      • Material Type
        Material Group
      • Base Unit of Measure
      • Purchase Order Unit of Measure
      • Client
      • Size/dimensions
      • Basic Material
      • Industry Standard Description (such as ANSI or ISO)
      • Purchasing Value Key
      • Gross Weight
      • Net Weight
      • Weight Unit
      • Volume
      • Volume Unit
      • Container requirements
      • Storage conditions
      • Hazardous material number
      • Division
      • Procurement rule
      • Source of Supply
      • Length
      • Width
      • Height
      • Unit of Dimension for Length/Width/Height
      • Product Hierarchy
      • Storage percentage
      • Net contents
      • Manufacturer number
      • Dangerous Goods Indicator Profile
      • Material Is Locked
      • Relevant for Hazardous Substances
      • Handling Unit Type
      • Unit of Measure for Maximum Packing Length/Width/Height
      • Material freight group
      • Loading Units
      • Packaging Code
      • Dangerous Goods Packaging Status
      • Return Code
      • Return to Logistics Level
      • Assignment UoM
      • Product Category
      • Packaging Material Type
      • Name of Person Who Created the Object
      • Material Category
    • MAKT
      • Material Description
      • Client
      • Material Number
      • Language
    • MARD
      • Material Number
      • Storage Location
      • Maintenance status
      • Valuated Unrestricted-Use Stock
      • Client
      • Stock in Quality Inspection
      • Total Stock of All Restricted Batches
      • Blocked Stock
      • Blocked Stock Returns
      • Physical inventory indicator for whose stock in current year
      • Physical inventory indicator for stock in quality inspection in current year
      • Physical inventory indicator for restricted-use stock
      • Storage location MRP indicator
      • Storage Bin
      • Profit Center
      • Created On
      • Plant
      • Special procurement type at storage location level
      • Data Division MARD
    • MBEW
      • Client
      • Material Number
      • Valuation Area
      • Valuation Type
      • Total Valuated Stock
      • Value of Total Valuated Stock
      • Price control indicator
      • Standard price
      • Price unit
      • Total valuated stock in previous period
      • Value of total valuated stock in previous period
      • Standard price in the previous period
      • Price unit of previous period
      • Fiscal Year of Current Period
      • Current period (posting period)
      • Valuation Category
      • Previous price
      • Date of the last price change
      • Future price
      • Date as of which the price is valid
      • UTC Time Stamp in Short Form (YYYYMMDDhhmmss)
      • Future planned price
      • Future Planned Price 1
      • Future Planned Price 2
      • Future Planned Price 3
      • Date from Which Future Planned Price 1 Is Valid
      • Date from Which Future Planned Price 2 Is Valid
      • Date from Which Future Planned Price 3 Is Valid
      • Material Is Costed with Quantity Structure
      • Previous planned price
      • Current Planned Price
      • Physical Inventory Blocking Indicator
      • Produced in-house
    • ATTYP
      • Material no.
      • Language Key
      • Activation Status of a Repository Object
      • Domain value key
      • Version of the entry (not used)
      • Short Text for Fixed Values
      • Language-specific values for domains, lower limit
      • Language-specific values for domains, upper limit
      • Values for Domains: Single Value / Upper Limit
    • T006A
      • Material no.
      • Language Key
      • Unit of Measurement
      • External Unit of Measurement in Commercial Format (3-Char)
      • External Unit of Measurement in Technical Format (6-Char)
      • Unit of Measurement Text (Maximum 10 Characters)
      • Unit of Measurement Text (Maximum 30 Characters)
    • ZT134T
      • Material Type
      • Language Key
      • Material Type
      • Description of material type
    • T023T
      • Material no.
      • Material Group
      • Material Group Desc
  • Total Rows - This output provides the total number of rows in the SAP system.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Segregate Material Response
